MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Peter Street, Lyon Close and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.15PM on 2nd February 2021.
